name: Goblinski and The Crystals of Destiny
name_original: Goblinski and The Crystals of Destiny
description:
Project 1 of our DATT4300 Class

Created by:

  • Dylan Bugeja
  • Caleb McNalley
  • Arshad Ousmand
  • Bao Nguyen
  • Jiaoxuan Hou
  • Tobi Matilukuro

Breakdown of the project:

Art

  • Background and Play area art: Jiaoxuan Hou
  • Level/UI/UX Design: Tobi Matilukuro
  • Goblin Sprites and Main Menu Artwork:  Arshad Ousmand
  • Wizard Sprite and Bolt:  Bao Nguyen
  • Logo and Crystal: Dylan Bugeja
  • Particle Effects: Caleb McNally
  • Font: Thanks to 1001 Fonts: Enchanted Land Font available at https://www.1001fonts.com/enchanted-land-font.html

Programming

  • Caleb McNally, Dylan Bugeja and Arshad Ousmand

Audio

  • Goblin sound effects and Lose Sound by: Arshad Ousmand
  • Thanks to Soundbible for our Cast sound and Win sound
  • Cast: http://soundbible.com/1359-Small-Fireball.html
  • Win: http://soundbible.com/1003-Ta-Da.html
  • Thanks to NoCopyrightSounds on Youtube for our Menu and Level Music
  • Menu Music:
  • Level Music:

 

Production and Assembly

  • Caleb McNally, Dylan Bugeja, Arshad Ousmand and Tobi  Matilukuro
